name: Disco Party Dancing Princess
description:
Hello everyone i hope you like to play this game with musically disco party game.with full of fun to make some food and cleaning disco studio and makeup with prom party makeup tools and decoration for all instruments for disco theat. thats amazing makeup and makeover games to do some task for every one to enjoy new concept games for all makeup and well dressing style you choose to do in disco party night with her friends.

Finish their looks with a trip to the dress shop to find outfits for the royal sisterhood. Mix and match blouses and skirts, or try on full length gowns with lots of glitz and glamour! Add pretty shoes and jewellery for each of them to fit their personalities. Don’t forget the tiaras!

*Makeup Section: Apply make-up including lipstick, eye-shadow, eye-
liner, powder and face paint! Change hair styles and so on

*DRESS UP for boys Section: The bride wore a red dress during
the wedding salon program

► GORGEOUS & COLOURFUL MAKE UP: Good work! Now for the "makeup" where you can make yourself look extra gorgeous

► BEAUTIFUL DRESS UP TIME: Now the finale! Get the best suited dress for the royal ball! You do need to dress up as lavishly as possible right!
